name: Cactus Care
description:
Cactus Care

Controls: WASD to move, J to attack, K to interact/give your cactus fertilizer

Lore: A lone ranger, secluded in the deserts of the US, tends to his best friend Charlise Cactus. But beware of the terrible tumbleweeds that seek to destroy all cacti. It's up to him to protect the cactus, and give it the fertilizer it needs to grow up big and strong.

Description: Protect the Cactus from Tumbleweeds. Attack with J. Walk over to the house to collect fertilizer to give to the Cactus using K. You win when the Cactus is fully grown.

Challenges:

Extra Retro Challenge: Used Palette 0 (Low)

Credits:

Developed by 3E, a small team of friends

Big Thanks to Pixel Pete, Brackeys, BlackThornProd, Family & Friends

Music and sounds made by team. Some Graphics made by team.
